title.rendered: Find, Recruit, Train, and Leverage Student Ambassadors in a Virtual Space

content.rendered:
This webinar was part of the 2020 Handshake Access Summer Series.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Featuring Kristin Williams, Executive Director of Career Services at Kent State University, this webinar will discuss best practices on finding and leveraging student ambassadors to their fullest potential in a virtual setting.
